title: Smartphone Trends 2024: What to Expect from Mobile Technology
author: Alex Kim
excerpt: Discover the latest smartphone innovations including foldable displays, AI cameras, and 5G advancements shaping the mobile landscape.
content:
Foldable Display Revolution

Foldable smartphones are becoming mainstream with improved durability and more affordable pricing. Samsung, Google, and OnePlus are leading the charge.

AI-Powered Cameras

Smartphone cameras now use AI for better low-light photography, portrait mode, and computational photography that rivals professional cameras.

5G Expansion

5G networks are expanding globally, enabling faster downloads, lower latency, and new applications like AR/VR experiences.

Battery Technology

New battery technologies promise longer life and faster charging. Some phones now support 200W fast charging.

Future Innovations

Expect to see under-display cameras, improved haptic feedback, and integration with IoT devices becoming standard features.
